gmd:metadataStandardName.gco:CharacterString: ISO 19115-2 Geographic Information - Metadata - Part 2: Extensions for Imagery and Gridded Data

gmd:title.gco:CharacterString: ONR Tropical Cyclone Intensity 2015 NASA WB-57 HDSS Dropsonde Data
ONR Tropical Cyclone Intensity 2015 NASA WB-57 HDSS Dropsonde Data

gmd:organisationName.gco:CharacterString: University at Albany, State University of New York

gmd:abstract.gco:CharacterString: This data set contains the high vertical resolution (0.5 second PTH and 0.25 second GPS and winds) profiles from the eXpendable Digital Dropsondes (XDD) from the High Definition Sounding System (HDSS) that was on the NASA WB-57 aircraft for the Tropical Cyclone Intensity (TCI) 2015 field campaign sponsored by the Office of Naval Research (ONR). The data set includes a total of 786 quality controlled dropsondes from 11 flights in four tropical cyclones in the eastern Pacific (Marty and Patricia) and Atlantic (Erika and Joaquin) basins. The data are in the columnar ASCII EOL Sounding Format and in tar files by flight.

gmd:name.gco:CharacterString: TAR: Unix Tape ARchive (TAR) Format File (application/x-tar)
